    • isUsernameExists

      public boolean isUsernameExists(String username) throws SQLException
      Checks if username already exists in the database
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check if it exists
      Returns:
      true if the user exists in the database, else otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • getAvailableUsers

      public List<User> getAvailableUsers(String username) throws SQLException
      Get list of all users that are available to play a game. That is when: 1. When User.isOnline() is true 2. Users that do not have an Event with status: - Event.EventStatus.PLAYING - Event.EventStatus.ACCEPTED
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user looking for available users
      Returns:
      a list of User
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • isUserAvailable

      public boolean isUserAvailable(String username) throws SQLException
      Check if a user is available to play a game. That is when user do not have an Event with status: - Event.EventStatus.PLAYING - Event.EventStatus.ACCEPTED
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to check for availability
      Returns:
      true if user is available, otherwise false
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • createEvent

      public void createEvent(Event event) throws SQLException
      Creates a new event in the database
      Parameters:
      event - The event to create
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • getEvent

      public Event getEvent(int eventId) throws SQLException
      Gets a event given a eventId
      Parameters:
      eventId - The eventId of the event
      Returns:
      and object of Event class
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • updateEvent

      public void updateEvent(Event event) throws SQLException
      Updates an event. All attributes are updated except eventId
      Parameters:
      event - The event to update
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • abortAllUserEvents

      public void abortAllUserEvents(String username) throws SQLException
      Aborts all event that are not completed. That is event with Event.EventStatus equal to: - Event.EventStatus.PENDING - Event.EventStatus.ACCEPTED - Event.EventStatus.DECLINED - Event.EventStatus.PLAYING
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • getUserInvitation

      public Event getUserInvitation(String username) throws SQLException
      Gets game invitation sent to a user (i.e Event.getOpponent())
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      The event of the invitation
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs

    • getUserInvitationResponse

      public Event getUserInvitationResponse(String username) throws SQLException
      Gets game invitation response earlier sent by a user (i.e Event.getSender())
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      The event of the invitation response
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database error occurs
